bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus Pet.
Anna Vine vs. Sheldon Jackson et al. Def.
Filed in the Day of March 1885
In the United States District Court. District of Alaska
Petition for a Writ of Habeas Corpus
Anna Vine Pet. vs. Sheldon Jackson, Alonzo E. Austin and

The complaintant Anna Vine, subject by marriage of her majest, Queen Victoria, Royal empress of India, for cause of compliance against the above named defendents: Sheldon Jackson, Alonzo E. Austin and as follows:
That one Emma Hamilton, a female minor child, about thirteen (13) years of age in unlawfully held in what is generally known as the Sheldon Jackson Institute
